Generation III.Ruby: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pok é mon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
Generation III.Sapphire: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
Generation III.Emerald: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.
Generation III.FireRed: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
